name: Coach Bus Driving Simulator 3D
description:
In this Coach Bus Simulator game, you have to start your career as a real bus driver. Show your driving skills and transport the tourist from one station to another. In Offroad coach bus driving sim game you will enjoy different and realistic environments i-e city and off-road. You have to obey all the traffic rules you have learnt in driving academy. If you don’t obey the traffic rules then you will lose points. This is the best simulator game in which you will the enjoy the driving of different buses. You have to transport the kids from their homes to school in school bus. Drive carefully. You are being assigned to the task to bring passengers safely from their bus stop to their destination. In Extreme Hill Bus Simulator you take on the role of a real-life bus driver working shifts in an offroad track and city environment. As you progress you will get in more difficult situations making important decisions as stakes are high. We expect great things from you.

Game features
- Realistic off-road track, highway and city environment
- Eye catching graphical interface
- Smooth controls i-e steering, tilt and button controls.
- Different type of busses i-e Schools buses, Coach buses and modern buses
- Realistic sound effect
